participant_2.background:

My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music.
my favorite drink is caramel cappuccino.

content.text: Good, good. I'm working on a project for my masters degree in Italian literature. What about you?
I'm doing great! I just got back from auditioning for a talent show.
Oh wow, that's awesome! Good luck! What kind of talent are you showing off?
I'm actually a singer. I'm pretty nervous about it, but I decided to give it a try.
That's amazing! I'm sure you'll do great. I love music. I'm a musician myself.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and I sing. I'm also trying to learn the ukulele.
That's cool. I've always wanted to learn the guitar.
It's a lot of fun! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
That's good to know. I'll have to look into getting one.
You should! It's a great hobby.
